On topic: It is illegal for a Kerbal to 'fall asleep' if they have not had at least 3 snacks prior to sleeping, and seeing as we do not have a 'snacks' resource in the game yet, the Kerbals don't sleep. Simples.

Kerbals actually have two brains instead of just separate hemispheres; while one is active, the other is at rest. One of those brains is the logical side, and the other is the side that craves explosions, death, mayhem, and destruction. It's often said that Kerbals who love space flight like Jebediah have "two left brains".
